headline: Competing railroads claim UP-NS merger application omits key information
summary: Rival railroads claim they’ve found many flaws in the Union Pacific-Norfolk Southern merger application and are asking the Surface Transportation Board to reject the document. The post Competing railroads claim UP-NS merger application omits key information appeared first on FreightWaves.

raw.headline: Competing railroads claim UP-NS merger application omits key information
raw.summary: Rival railroads claim they’ve found many flaws in the Union Pacific-Norfolk Southern merger application and are asking the Surface Transportation Board to reject the document. The post Competing railroads claim UP-NS merger application omits key information appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Union Pacific Corporation Announces Fourth Quarter 2025 Earnings Release Date
summary: OMAHA, Neb., December 30, 2025--Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) will release fourth quarter 2025 financial and operating results on Tuesday, January 27, 2026, at 7:45 a.m. ET. The company’s management team will host a conference call and live webcast at 8:45 a.m. ET.
